trends: There have been no other sightings in Paris
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 1 am, my mother and i (who had been watching the skies for any signs) saw what appeared to be a star, only much brighter. it was hanging low in the south and made no noticeable moves. with binoculars, we could see it distinctly blinking blue to red to yellow\white. by 4 am it had moved higher and more to the east, and by 530 am it was no longer visible. if anyone else saw this, email me at megaboox@yahoo.com
